694510.name: Fictorum OST
694510.description:
A dramatic and bombastic soundtrack, composer Jeff Dodson (Neverwinter Nights 2: Mask of the Betrayer, X-Men: The Official Game, Stardrive) takes you on a journey through the world of Fictorum. Comprised of 18 tracks.

01 Fictorum Theme
02 The Inquisition Approaches
03 I Am A Shopkeeper
04 Inquisition Duel
05 Requiem For Fictorum
06 The Inquisition Arrives
07 Nexus Transport
08 They're Here
09 Down With The Inquisition
10 Miasma
11 The Old Tavern
12 Bandits Attack
13 Inquisition Scouts
14 Peaks Among The Clouds
15 Fictorum In Solace
16 Spirits In The Fog
17 Hark The Corrupted
18 Final Inquisition
694510.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
